system.requirements:
Tier 3; Willpower 35
Aptitudes: Willpower, Psyker, Tzeentch
system.effect: When a Focus Power Test results in a Psychic Phenomena, roll twice and take the more favourable result. Perils of the Warp work as normal.

description.value: When a Focus Power Test results in a Psychic Phenomena, roll twice and take the more favourable result. Perils of the Warp work as normal.
